examples: She seems reasonably happy in her new job.
Parece razonablemente feliz en su nuevo trabajo.
We tried to discuss the matter calmly and reasonably.
Intentamos discutir el asunto con calma y de manera razonable.
He couldn't reasonably be expected to pay back the loan all at once.
No se podía esperar razonablemente que devolviera el préstamo de una vez.
